about_the_game:
The Game

"All one click" is an Action-RPG that reduces player input to the most existing part of every RPG: the level-up.
Prove yourself against thousands of enemies in seemingly endless waves.
Use the power of your magic spells to assert yourself against the countless enemies.
Cast powerful fireballs, summon lightning strikes and use dark arcane powers to stand your ground.

Further information and screenshots to follow ...

The development of "All one click" is in a very early stage.
Follow "Out of the Box Games" on social media to stay updated.
